mapper.select: select rn ,p_inq_no, p_inq_title, mem_id,p_inq_status from (select rn ,p_inq_no, p_inq_title, mem_id,p_inq_status from (select rownum rn ,p_inq_no, p_inq_title, mem_id,p_inq_status from (select p_inq_no, p_inq_title, mem_id,p_inq_status from personal_inquiry where mem_id = #{id} order by p_inq_no desc)) where rn >=#{startNo}) where rn <= #{endNo}
select p_inq_no, p_inq_title, mem_id, p_inq_detail,p_inq_answer, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regdate from personal_inquiry where p_inq_no = #{p_inq_no}
select count(*) from personal_inquiry where mem_id = #{mem_id}
